job_tasks.phrase: verzekeren dat NS-medewerkers de technologie veilig en verantwoord kunnen gebruiken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand how the technology aligns with user safety and responsible usage within the business context of NS.

job_tasks.phrase: realisatie van de NS-visie: Samen maken wij Nederland bereikbaar. Voor iedereen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly links the role to the overarching business vision and mission of the company.

job_tasks.phrase: introduceren van Generative AI binnen NS
job_tasks.justification: This implies building and integrating GenAI capabilities into the existing NS environment, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: schakelt veel met IT collega's, biedt oplossingen en zorgt voor verbetering
job_tasks.justification: This suggests active participation in technical discussions, problem-solving, and contributing to system improvements, characteristic of software development roles.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met andere ambitieuze full-stack, data engineering en cloud engineering professionals werk je in een gemotiveerd team
Je schakelt veel met IT collega's
Belangrijke aspecten hierbij zijn privacy en security.
Hoe zorgen we ervoor dat NS-medewerkers de technologie veilig en verantwoord kunnen gebruiken?

classification.rationale: The job description mentions introducing Generative AI and working with professionals in related fields, but lacks specific details about core GenAI tasks like model fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG systems. It also doesn't mention specific GenAI technologies or frameworks.
